columns.name: db_cluster_snapshot_identifier
columns.description: The friendly name to identify the cluster snapshot.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the cluster snapshot.

columns.name: snapshot_type
columns.description: The type of the cluster snapshot.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Specifies the status of this cluster snapshot.

columns.name: db_cluster_identifier
columns.description: The friendly name to identify the cluster, that the snapshot snapshot was created from.

columns.name: snapshot_create_time
columns.description: The time when the snapshot was taken.

columns.name: cluster_create_time
columns.description: Specifies the time when the cluster was created.

columns.name: engine
columns.description: Specifies the name of the database engine.

columns.name: engine_version
columns.description: Specifies the version of the database engine for this cluster snapshot.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The AWS KMS key identifier for the AWS KMS customer master key (CMK).

columns.name: master_user_name
columns.description: Provides the master username for the cluster snapshot.

columns.name: percent_progress
columns.description: Specifies the percentage of the estimated data that has been transferred.

columns.name: port
columns.description: Specifies the port that the cluster was listening on at the time of the snapshot.

columns.name: source_db_cluster_snapshot_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the source cluster snapshot, if the cluster snapshot was copied from a source cluster snapshot.

columns.name: storage_encrypted
columns.description: Specifies whether the cluster snapshot is encrypted, or not.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: Provides the VPC ID associated with the cluster snapshot.

columns.name: availability_zones
columns.description: A list of Availability Zones (AZs) where instances in the cluster snapshot can be restored.

columns.name: db_cluster_snapshot_attributes
columns.description: A list of DB cluster snapshot attribute names and values for a manual cluster snapshot.

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags attached to the cluster snapshot.
